    • Method Detail

      • addComments

        org.json.simple.JSONObject addComments(java.lang.String cmtType,
                                     int cmtTypeid,
                                     int pty_id,
                                     java.lang.String cmt_lines,
                                     java.util.Date cmt_date)
        This method used to save a comments details into database.It will return a added comment details.
        Parameters:
        cmtType - It has a constant value "COMMENTS".
        cmtTypeid - This integer value holds activity type id.
        pty_id - A primary key of beacon element.
        cmt_lines - This string holds an comment text.
        cmt_date - This parameter holds current system date and time.
        Returns:
        Returns JSONObject has a value of recently added comments.

      • getCommentswithPagination

        org.json.simple.JSONArray getCommentswithPagination(int cmtypeid,
                                                  java.lang.String cmttype,
                                                  int pageno,
                                                  int pagesize)
        This method used to get all the comments from database. Comments are listing with pagination.
        Parameters:
        cmtypeid - This integer value holds activity type id.
        cmttype - It has a constant value "COMMENTS".
        pageno - current page number.
        pagesize - Total number of records shown in current page.
        Returns:
        Returns JSONArray contains all the results of comments.
